lines: 1. Nkarora ase enchera,Omont'oyom' orosete,Akabwati' OmosalabaBun'omogendi omuya;Orosire, nechingikichichire obosio bwaye,"Ng'ai kwarusi'Omokia"?agantebia "Okwegena".
2. Na oyomo nkamororaNe ritimo na enguba,Akarwana nechinguruEri'anyore egutwa;Nonya orosire mono;Tachieti kwemurungania,"Ng'ai kwarusi' omokia"?Agantebia "Okwegena".
3. Nar'oyom' otiget'abasaniBobosae bwaye,'Gatig' esiko n'emegokoAtar'as'obokong'u,Nony'amatemw'areo 'Koroki-'omosasok' obosio,"Ng'ai kwarusi'omokia"?Aganetebia "okwegena".
4. Bun'abaeti as'orogendoAs'ense'eye yebibe,Gochaywa, 'bokong'u, nogosikwa,Nonya nas'embera,Goika Omogambi ache'Toire ntw'abasakore nka,"Nki kiabaeire Omokia"?Neke gioka, "Okwegena"
